Language.Sentence: The Menu type produces the object that represents a menu navigation, based on the top-level containers structure of VDOM application, that is set in the Tree mode of VDOM IDE. It allows keeping the track of the location within the web page by means of selecting the current node and defining the level of other web pages relatively to the current node. The titles of HTML containers are displayed as the menu items, so to create a Menu object each HTML container object must have the 'Title' attribute filled.

Action.SourceCode: vdom_ui_show(this.domCont, fade, zindex, toparent); if (timeout > 0) vdom_ui_setMenuHide(this.domCont, timeout, zindexOff, toparentOff);
